value.title: Personal Gateway governance in Power BI

value.title: Power BI Auditing
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at the Power BI Auditing feature that was made available a few weeks ago. I show how to turn it on and how to search. value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory
